title: Fmr. Venezuela Ambassador: 'Hope, Not Faith' in Revival
description: Patrick Duddy, visiting senior lecturer at Duke University and former U.S. ambassador to Venezuela, says Maduro’s capture shows that President Trump wasn’t bluffing about using force. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
